messages.400: Clear your path, clear your mind
messages.404: Nature reminds us: not all who wander are lost
messages.406: The right tools make the journey easier
messages.408: Time flows like a gentle stream
messages.410: Endings make way for new growth
messages.503: Rest is part of the cycle
messages.default: Nature reminds us: not all who wander are lost

descriptions.400: Your request took an unclear path. Like reading a trail map incorrectly, sometimes we need to reassess our direction and try again.
descriptions.401: This area requires permission to enter. Some trails are reserved for those with the proper credentials. Seek access first.
descriptions.402: Entry to this area requires a park pass. Nature's beauty sometimes asks for our support in return.
descriptions.403: This section of the park is off-limits. Respect the boundaries that protect both visitors and nature alike.
descriptions.404: Like a trail that fades into the forest, this page has wandered off the beaten path. Take a moment to breathe in the tranquility, then find your way back.
descriptions.405: That approach won't work on this trail. Sometimes we need to adjust our method to match the terrain.
descriptions.406: Your current equipment isn't suited for this path. Find compatible tools for your journey ahead.
descriptions.408: The connection timed out like a sunset over the water. Give it a moment, then try your journey again.
descriptions.409: Two paths are crossing in conflict. Nature teaches us to pause, reassess, and find harmony in the confusion.
descriptions.410: This trail has been permanently closed. Like seasons changing, some paths end so new ones can begin.
descriptions.413: Your pack is too heavy for this trail. Lighten your load and enjoy a more comfortable journey.
descriptions.429: The trail is crowded right now. Like wildlife at dawn, sometimes patience and timing make all the difference.
descriptions.500: The park system encountered an error. Even in nature, systems need maintenance. Our rangers are working on it.
descriptions.502: The bridge between sections is out. Nature's pathways require care and repair. We're working to restore the connection.
descriptions.503: The park is temporarily closed for maintenance. Rest assured, the forest will welcome you again soon.
descriptions.504: The trail connection was lost. Sometimes signals fade in the wilderness. Try reconnecting with nature again.
descriptions.default: Like a trail that fades into the forest, this page has wandered off the beaten path. Take a moment to breathe in the tranquility, then find your way back.

footers.413: Less is more on the trail
footers.429: Good things come to those who wait
